title: Great Events by Famous Historians, Volume 3
description: A comprehensive and readable account of the world's history, emphasizing the more important events, and presenting these as complete narratives in the master-words of the most eminent historians.   This is volume 3 of 22, covering from 13 to 395 AD. - Summary Adapted from the Title Page
